thread.title: Well located off Champs Élysées
thread.title_full: Well located off Champs Élysées - Review of InterContinental Paris-Avenue Marceau, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: rktripp
title: Well located off Champs Élysées
text:
Nice Intercontinental boutique hotel , very well located off champs élysées.
Overall attentive and serviceable staff, good restaurant.
Rooms are on the small side but nicely designed and comfortable.
On the minus side : plumbing needs redoing as shower pressure is minimal.
Housekkeping is not up to five star level however and needs to be more professional.
